main event: A witness observed a silent object with red, blue, and green lights that increased altitude and disappeared after about 1 minute in Commack, Long Island, New York.
interesting points: The object was silent while moving at an estimated speed of 20 mph.,It had a body that appeared transparent.,The witness compared the object to a garment bag hot air balloon.,The object did not resemble any known aircraft as it lacked wings and attachments.,The sighting lasted for approximately one minute before the object vanished.
sighted object: one silent object with red, blue, and green lights
witness description: A couple who reported the sighting, noting the object's size and speed.
